mapper.select: SELECT e.serial, c.discount_rate*100 AS discountRate, TO_CHAR(e.expiration_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS expirationDate , e.status FROM coupones c JOIN offer_coupones e ON c.coupone_id = e.coupone_id WHERE e.email = #{email}

SELECT e.serial, c.discount_rate*100 AS discountRate, TO_CHAR(e.expiration_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS expirationDate , e.status FROM coupones c JOIN offer_coupones e ON c.coupone_id = e.coupone_id WHERE e.status = '사용가능' AND e.email = #{email} AND e.expiration_date > SYSDATE-1 ORDER BY c.discount_rate ASC
